items.sentence: Let\'s get together the next time you come back to Boston.
Tom found a hair in his soup and complained to the waiter.
Tom found an old picture of his grandparents in the attic.
Tom got tired of waiting for Mary, so he left without her.
Tom could hardly speak French at all when I first met him.
I\'ll have to speak with Tom before I can make a decision.
I\'m going to write down their names before I forget them.
Tom and Mary laughed about the time they had a food fight.
Tom and Mary looked like they wanted to be alone together.
Tom and Mary showed me the letter they received from John.
Tom and Mary spent the weekend working on a jigsaw puzzle.
I wouldn\'t be here today if Tom hadn\'t asked me to come.
Are you sure you don\'t want to stay for a couple of days?
Are you sure you want to borrow Tom\'s car without asking?
Dr. Jackson is one of the leading cardiologists in Boston.
Eventually, Tom will tell me where he buried the treasure.
Every even number greater than 2 is the sum of two primes.
Tom didn\'t know why Mary needed to borrow thirty dollars.
Tom didn\'t seem surprised when I told him why I did that.
Tom doesn\'t believe Mary could do that without some help.
